definition: marked by casual disrespect, (sports) the act of throwing the ball to another member of your team, reverse (a direction, attitude, or course of action)
details:
adjective
- marked by casual disrespect
= example: marked by casual disrespect
= synonyms: insolent
noun
- (sports) the act of throwing the ball to another member of your team
= synonyms: pass
- an acrobatic feat in which the feet roll over the head (either forward or backward) and return
= synonyms: somersault
- a dive in which the diver somersaults before entering the water
- the act of flipping a coin
= synonyms: toss
- a sudden, quick movement
= example: a sudden, quick movement
- hot or cold alcoholic mixed drink containing a beaten egg
verb
- reverse (a direction, attitude, or course of action)
= synonyms: interchange
- go mad, go crazy
= example: go mad, go crazy
= synonyms: flip out
- react in an excited, delighted, or surprised way
= example: react in an excited, delighted, or surprised way
= synonyms: flip out
- turn upside down, or throw so as to reverse
= example: turn upside down, or throw so as to reverse
= synonyms: turn over, flip over
- move with a flick or light motion
- cause to go on or to be engaged or set in operation
= synonyms: throw
- throw or toss with a light motion
= example: throw or toss with a light motion
= synonyms: toss
- lightly throw to see which side comes up
= example: lightly throw to see which side comes up
= synonyms: toss
- cause to move with a flick
= synonyms: flick
- toss with a sharp movement so as to cause to turn over in the air
= synonyms: twitch
- look through a book or other written material
= synonyms: riffle
